SELECT k.id, k.user_id, k.settlement_date, k.expense_item_id, ei.expense_item_name, k.expenditure_amount, k.income_amount, k.settlement_id, s.settlement_name, k.used_store, k.remarks, k.insert_at, k.update_at, k.is_deleted FROM kakeibo AS k INNER JOIN expense_item as ei ON k.expense_item_id = ei.id LEFT JOIN settlement as s ON k.settlement_id = s.id
k.is_deleted = false
and TO_CHAR(k.settlement_date, 'YYYY') LIKE '${year}'
and TO_CHAR(k.settlement_date, 'YYYY-MM') LIKE '${year}-%${month}%'
ORDER BY k.settlement_date DESC, k.update_at DESC;

SELECT k.id, k.user_id, k.settlement_date, k.expense_item_id, ei.expense_item_name, k.expenditure_amount, k.income_amount, k.settlement_id, s.settlement_name, k.used_store, k.remarks, k.insert_at, k.update_at FROM kakeibo AS k INNER JOIN expense_item as ei ON k.expense_item_id = ei.id LEFT JOIN settlement as s ON k.settlement_id = s.id WHERE k.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kakeibo (user_id, settlement_date, expense_item_id, expenditure_amount, income_amount, settlement_id, used_store, remarks) VALUES (#{userId}, #{settlementDate}, #{expenseItemId}, #{expenditureAmount}, #{incomeAmount}, #{settlementId}, #{usedStore}, #{remarks})
mapper.select: SELECT ei.id, ei.expense_item_name, SUM(k.expenditure_amount) AS total_by_expense_item, ROUND((100.0 * SUM(k.expenditure_amount) / ( SELECT SUM(expenditure_amount) AS total_expenditure_amount FROM kakeibo WHERE is_deleted = false and TO_CHAR(settlement_date, 'YYYY-MM') LIKE '${year}-%${month}%' )) , 2) AS income_and_expenditure_breakedown_rate FROM expense_item AS ei LEFT JOIN kakeibo AS k ON ei.id = k.expense_item_id WHERE k.is_deleted = false and k.expense_item_id NOT IN(1, 2, 3) and TO_CHAR(k.settlement_date, 'YYYY-MM') LIKE '${year}-%${month}%' GROUP BY ei.id, ei.expense_item_name ORDER BY total_by_expense_item DESC

SELECT SUM(income_amount) AS total_income_amount, SUM(expenditure_amount) AS total_expenditure_amount, (SUM(income_amount) - SUM(expenditure_amount)) AS balance_calculation_result FROM kakeibo
is_deleted = false and TO_CHAR(settlement_date, 'YYYY') LIKE '${year}'
and TO_CHAR(settlement_date, 'YYYY-MM') LIKE '${year}-%${month}%'
